var SEARCH_DELAY_TIME=1000;var getValueLength=function getValueLength(str){var code;var len=0;for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){code=str.charCodeAt(i);if(code==10){//solve enter problem
len+=2;}else if(code<0x007f){len+=1;}else if(code>=0x0080&&code<=0x07ff){len+=2;}else if(code>=0x0800&&code<=0xffff){len+=3;}}return len;};export{SEARCH_DELAY_TIME,getValueLength};
